meanings.definition: A person or group that pays the cost or expense of something.
meanings.sent1: The generous defrayers of the charity event made a big impact.
meanings.sent2: The defrayers of the school trip ensured all students could participate.
meanings.sent3: The defrayers of the pizza party were hailed as heroes by hungry students.
meanings.sent4: The defrayers of the storm damage were like knights rescuing a village.
meanings.sent5: The defrayers of the medical bills were like guardian angels to the family in need.

meanings.definition: The act of covering the cost or expense of something.
meanings.sent1: The defrayers of the project expenses were acknowledged at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The defrayers of the travel costs made the trip possible for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The defrayers of the ice cream social were thanked with smiles and sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: The defrayers of the road repairs worked tirelessly to fix the potholes.
meanings.sent5: The defrayers of the party decorations turned the venue into a festive wonderland.
